meanings.definition: The quality, state, or characteristic of being artistic or creative.
meanings.sent1: Her artiness shone through in every painting she created.
meanings.sent2: The artiness of the sculpture was truly captivating.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at adding more artiness to the project ended up looking messy.
meanings.sent4: The artiness of her dance was like a colorful whirlwind on stage.
meanings.sent5: The artiness of the play left a lasting impression on the audience.

meanings.definition: The use of artistic techniques or effects in a work of art.
meanings.sent1: The film director's artiness was evident in every scene.
meanings.sent2: I admired the artiness of the brush strokes in the painting.
meanings.sent3: The artiness of the special effects in the movie made it truly spectacular.
meanings.sent4: Her artiness with colors transformed the plain canvas into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The artiness of the music video added a whole new dimension to the song.

meanings.definition: Excessive or affected artistic quality or style.
meanings.sent1: The artiness decorations at the party seemed overdone.
meanings.sent2: She always wore the most artiness outfits to stand out.
meanings.sent3: His artiness mannerisms made everyone roll their eyes.
meanings.sent4: The artiness design of the building clashed with its surroundings.
meanings.sent5: The artiness makeup made her look like a clown.
